==Locations==
Cicins' locations cannot be pinpointed by using the [[Adventurer Handbook]], as there is no entry about them.
*Hydro Cicins can be found near [[Guyun Stone Forest]].

==Descriptions==
{{Description|Little creatures that can ever so slightly manipulate Hydro.<br />They and other such creatures are known collectively as Cicins, and they truly adore the rare and wonderful Mist Grass plant. It is by exploiting this relationship that the Fatui Mages have sought to commandeer Cicins in battle.|[[Archive]]}}
